name: UNDER THE BLUE SKY: AITO'S ROUTE
name_original: UNDER THE BLUE SKY: AITO'S ROUTE
description:
Please be noted, Kosuke and Naoki are not a part of this route. This route contains its own different characters.

Summary  

 

When you are sacked from your previous job, you lose everything, your apartment, bank-balance and the lifestyle you were used to up until now. Without any means of subsistence and in a dire need to save money, you move to a dilapidated apartment complex, but life isn’t easy in that place, especially when a guy who lives in the same apartment complex is hell-bent on making your life miserable with his sharp tongue and bovine nature.  

 

Your best friend, Yui brings you good news about a job opening in a well-known group of companies, following her advice; you apply for the job and secure a position for yourself.

Once you join the company you uncover very dark secrets which involve the boss and his underlings. You begin suspecting the boss when he targets you with his sexual harassment, eventually you find out his true motives.

  • 40k words
  • Slow-burn
  • Atmospheric
  • Female protagonist
  • Meaningful choices 

 

Character description:

Ishikawa Aito:

 

A rowdy and callous man who thinks he owns the world. He somehow knows how to push your buttons with the use of mere words. As you get to know him, you discover the gentle side of him and find out that he is only callous on the outside, but a true gentleman on the inside. You also discover the secrets he hides behind the visor of nonchalance.

 

Sawamura Daisuke:

 

He is an employee in the same company, he is provided with the task of training you. He is a very serious and stoic looking person, but as you spend the time in his company, you find out another side of his character which is as sinister as his eyes… What kind of secrets is he trying to hide behind that stoic mask of his…?

 

Yoshiharu Shoji:

 

Your CEO, although he appears to be a responsible and well behaved person, you are shown a side of him that nobody knows about. You find out his true colors when he makes you an offer.

 

Reika:

A sweet woman who works in the same office, she is shy around people, but she likes you and loves talking to you.

 

Yui:

She is your only best friend who knows you like the back of her hand. She is always there for you no matter what the circumstances.

 

There are many more characters to discover in the game.

 

Warning:

 

This game contains themes of human trafficking and sexual harassment player discretion is advised.

Strong language, use of excessive expletives.
